gitlab.createToken:
Link to create gitlab token:
https://%s/-/profile/personal_access_tokens
Api rights required
gitlab.addWebHookInstruction:
Creating webhook:
1. Open project
2. Go to Settings->Webhook
3. Insert link into URL section
4. Choose event types.
5. Add webhook'
